English: After much discussion with the Great Powers who've we have been at war with, they've decided to fully dismantle our Empire. We must unfortunetly accept this Peace Deal.
The Destruction of $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ Power has resulted in us acquiring major Territories that we once dreamt of owning, and that we have claimed have been transferred over to us.
Our Overlord of $FROMCOUNTRY$ has recently been beaten in a Major War, and been promptly dismantled. This news comes with our Liberation from their Rule.

The Hungarians have been agitated for a while now, and they've decided to revolt! They're trying to topple our great nation and destroy what we want! \n \n We can only respond in one way... War. We must take them out by force!
We have to punish these Fools, who've thought to take our rightful territories of Uruguay. We must give them some sort of a Punishment to get their Foolish Ideas out of this nation.
We must punish the fools that thought that Uruguay is theirs and thus We have to take action to keep them from taking it over.
The Government of Rio de Janeiro has demanded We cease land over to them, specifically, Uruguay. We have to respond.
We cannot let this go to war.
They can take it from our dead bodies!
The Government of Buesno Aires has refused to cease Uruguay over to us. We have to respond.
We cannot let this go to war.
They can take it from our dead bodies!

Ever since Belgium's incorperation into France proper, the unrest of the Belgians has been increasing exponentially over time, having the possibility of a Revolt being less of an if question, but a when question. The Belgian Revolution seems likely to happen within a few Decades, possibly even earlier than we expect. 
	
	While Napoleon's methods to keep the Belgian populous under control seem to work, less and less are happy with these Methods, possibly due to his Death. 
	
	Anything We can hope for, is that Belgium remains...
The Belgian Population have had enough. Their unrest has boiled over into a Revolution, all for their Nation. \n	\n	The mesurements done by Napoleon have seemingly failed. It's now all or nothing.

Problems in the Rheinland have existed ever since it's integration into France proper. The Local's, while seemingly not having great freedoms, prefer the idea of an United German Nation. A Nation who would be our Worst Enemy if formed. 
	
	The Area has overtime had many revolts that have been supressed, yet it seems for now the populous believes that another Revolt is futile as the previous ones have failed against the French Army. 
	
	The only Question that remains now is: what will happen to the Region?
The Government of Paris has requested that we allow them to reorginize their Nation to however they want. We must respond.
The Government of Amsterdam has accepted our request of Reorginzation. We must decide on how though...
Amsterdam should be integrated into France Proper!
The Southern Netherlands should be Integrated.

A recent comment made by a politician has riled up the nation by simply saying that France should reclaim the Spanish territory of Catalonia. \n	\n The Comment has sparked Arguments in the Parliament, some opposing the idea of claiming our Allies' land and others in full support. We need your Input, Emperor.

The City of Cologne, Mainz and Saarbrucken, as well as the general Rheinland Area, has decided to declare their Independance against the French Empire, since the Belgians have decided to Revolt. \n	\n	It seems that the matter of time has gone against us. Yet, We believe that France will continue to live on... right...?

A recent report from the Regions of Wallonia and Flanders has revealed that most of their populations have abandoned the idea of an Independant Belgium. As time goes on, more and more of the Populous are more and more loyal to Paris than Brussels. \n	\n	Our work to further Integrate Belgium has payed off, and the Belgians are slowly losing their thoughts of "Independance" and "Revolution". Belgium is now an undeniable part of France.

A recent diplomatic Incident between a British naval ship and French trading vessel has increased tensions yet again. This time however, it seems like it might escalate into War. Tensions are rapidly increasing ever since that incident went down. 
	
	The French Government claims this was an intentional British attack on French trading, and claim that Britain is trying to stunt their Nation, while the British Government claims this was an accident and the French Government is at blame. 
	
	Only time will tell if this turns to war...
We can only hope it doesn't...

The United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland has recently sent in demands to dismantle our glorious Empire, saying amongst other things, that "Napoleonic Order" has "ruined Europe" and that "Napoleon must be desposed". This is absolute nonsense, yet the biggest threat is that if We don't accept, war is guaranteed. What do we do? How do we respond?

Upon the first meeting, it was clear that the Sentiment in the Treaty room was mutual, Destroy Britain at all costs. How though wasn't quite thought out. Thus, We need Your input to determine the fate of Great Britain.

Our First bid of discourse, how to handle the British Isles. Some argue for a Napoleonic Republic, some for a free state of Ireland and some even go as far as to suggest to dismantle the idea of Uniting the British Isles. What's Your input?
Arguments for the British Raj have gone back and forth, some saying that it should be integrated into France, some saying to retain it and some saying to free it. What's your Input?
Arguments for the English Raj have gone back and forth, some saying that it should be integrated into France, some saying to retain it and some saying to free it. What's your Input?
Dismantlement of Australia and New Zealand
Australia and New Zealand have had two main arguments, One for Freedom and One for Total Takeover. Which one should we go with?
Dismantlement of Australia and New Zealand
Australia and New Zealand have had two main arguments, One for Freedom and One for Total Takeover. Which one should we go with?

Tonight, let it be known that on the year of $YEAR$, that Charlemagne's Legacy shall be restored. His name shall be known for generations, as the great Carolingian Empire shall dominate Europe once more. It is practically only guaranteed. 
	
	The Carolingian Reign will last for decades... 
	
	... right?
Our Project for the Kiel Canal requires a lot of Funding, thus We need to give it funding. The Requested amount is about One Hundred Thousand. How much should we fund?
After Months of Work, the Kiel Canal has been finished by our masterful Workers. We shall celebrate this day from now on!

After several talking points, the Paris Conference has ended! Thanks to your Guidance, we have properly destroyed the British Empire! We shall make it known that messing with the Napoleonic Code will net a Punishment!
Diplomats have arrived, all to demand Territories from the French scourge. We must ensure the absolute Destruction of the Napoleonic Order, and We need your Input in how.

The Reorginization of Belgium has given us several Arguments as to how to manage the Territory. The Parliament is divided between 4 Groups, France retaining Belgium, Belgium freed, Flanders and Wallonia Freed or the Netherlands being given Belgium. Which Proposal should we go with?
Flanders and Wallonia must be freed.
Give over Belgium to the Netherlands.

The Rheinland, while being in French Control, has clearly been German and only under French Suppression. The Facts are clear, yet We need to make a Decision on who to transfer over the Rheinland to. Prussia, or the Netherlands. What is Your Input?
Give it over to the Netherlands!

A recent letter from a French Diplomat has informed us that the French demand Catalonia to be given over to them, and while this is outrageous and a bogus claim, Everyone fears what will happen if we refuse to agree. We must respond accordingly, and We must think it out.
A recent skirmish between British and Chinese Naval ships has resulted in a direct Confrontation and Battle. This is outrageous and the Chinese must pay for what they've done.
On second thought, maybe We should negotiate.

The recently re-instated Spanish Monarchs have demanded we give Northern Catalonia and Northern Basque over to them as to make them like us more. The British Parliament seems to be torn on the issue, some wanting to go through, others wanting to deny. What's your Input?
Just like our previous dilemma, the Italians have demanded Nice and Savoy be transfered to them. Should We allow this?

Napoleonic Order has been destroyed, and thanks to you, it seems We've properly destroyed it. Here's to an end of Napoleonic Domination, and it'll be our job now to repair the Damage caused by the French.

It is clear that We must decide on a new Government for France, it's only natural. We don't have a clear consensus though, and We need your help to decide if France should be Monarchist, Republican or a Constitutional Monarchy.
A recent letter from American officials has demanded we secede several territories they claim as "their own" for some idiotic reason. It appears our only choice is to respond somehow.
We won't let those Americans win!
We will take the Territories we demanded.
The North Mexican Territories are Ours!
We demand a Mexican Rump State!
The End of the Austrian Empire

On $YEAR$, the most recent Habsburg has abdicated from the throne, leaving behind no successor to take the reign. The Empire, already in a sorry state, simply couldn't handle this and imploded on itself. 
 The First to leave was Hungary, who simply got fed up with having to deal with the mess of the Habsburgs. A swift declaration of Independance didn't even net a response by the Austrian government which was swiftly collapsing. 
 Then came the breakaway states of the Hungarians, like the Slovakians and Translyvanians, who didn't want a majority Hungarian-ruled state. 
 By this point, the Kingdom of Slavonia took advantage and went in on Territories they claimed as their own to assert themselves. 
 Finally, the Kingdom of Bohemia left the Empire. 
 
 What was left of the Austrians was a rump state. An embarrasment.

Despite many challenges and difficulties, the Austrian Empire has managed to survive the current Climate with the decisions done by the Habsburgs and Ruling Party. Thanks to them, we can now ensure another few decades worth of the Empire's existance!

Unfortunately, in the Modern World, our current Constitution is no longer up to date. This has also caused severe disatisfaction in the non-Austrian Parts of the Empire. We can only hope that everything will go well...

The Empire has failed to reform, and it is now only a matter of time that the Empire collapses. The only thing holding it together is the Emperor, and yet even that is extremely loose. It seems that the end is near.

The State of Aosta has existed for several years since the Napoleonic Wars ended in the Italian Peninsula. For the longest time it has been debated if this State should remain Independant, Join Italy or Join France. There's been calls for all three from the population and We request you decide.
It appears that the Government has recently been reformed by force from Revolutionaries. While being unintentional, it seems as if this is a crucial step towards reform.
The Destruction of the Napoleonic Code

While it originally seemed like the Napoleonic Code would help balance Europe and ensure Napoleonic Dominance, this seems to have changed now. As time has gone on, more and more rivals of Napoleon have come in and challenged the notion of a Napoleonic Europe. 
 While there was belief in the idea, eventually it's flaws were too prominant. It has then been decided by a board of multiple high ranking members of the State to abolish the Napoleonic Code. 
 
 Only one can pray Europe doesn't descend into Madness.
We pray the Continent doesn't fall.
It is now up to you to answer the fateful Question. \n Is Austria German? Is Austria it's own thing?

A formal request by the small state of Memel has revealed they have intrests in being integrated into our Nation. Popular support has been in favor of bringing Memel into Prussia proper. What is our response?

The former state of Memel used to treat the Lithuanians and Ashkhenazi living in their state as equals to the Germans, as it was necessary for the stability of the state. If they didn't, they'd collapse. 
 Ever since their Annexation into our nation, calls have been made to give equality to those populations and ensure their freedoms. 
 
 How do we respond?
We can give them their freedoms.

Several claims have gone around that if a German were to take over Austria, that Bohemia should naturally go with it. We have recently been given this opportunity to claim Bohemia by an anonymous source and as such, We could be able to claim it. What is our Response?

Since we have doubled down on Traditionalism, the Nation's rejected any and all Developments of Technology. The main Issue appears to be the lack of Innovation, and the longer we wait, the more our enemies have an advantage on us...

It appears that as time has went on, the agitation of the Southern States has only increased and that We're about to get a Civil War in a few Years. The Southerners have been slowly pushing for Independance from our Union and soon enough, State's rights will be tested to see if the Union persists.
After Months of Work, the Suez Canal has been finished by our masterful Workers. We shall celebrate this day from now on!
After Months of Work, the Panama Canal has been finished by our masterful Workers. We shall celebrate this day from now on!
Our Project for the Suez Canal requires a lot of Funding, thus We need to give it funding. The Requested amount is about One Hundred Thousand. How much should we fund?
Our Project for the Panama Canal requires a lot of Funding, thus We need to give it funding. The Requested amount is about One Hundred Thousand. How much should we fund?

Early today, the Confederacy has declared itself Independant from the States, all for us even having considered abolishing the practices of Slavery. 
 It is now clear, the only way forward is war. As undesirable as it is, it's required. 
 
 We can only pray for so much.

The United States has been, shamefully, practicing Slavery ever since it's founding, and as thus, we have been forced to appease the Dixies. A compromise, if you will. 
 
 The States have been split between South and North. The Northern States have outruled the practice completely, while the Southern ones still practice it. 
 
 It's only a matter a time before this becomes a Problem.

Lately, a creeping feeling has been coming over the People. Something just doesn't feel right with the United States. What happened...? 
 What was once a state full of Freedom and Liberties, now appears to strive... 
 
 ... for the opposite. It... It just doesn't make any sense. Did we cause this? Was this the fault of the People's? 
 
 ... In any case, one thing's for certain. 
 The American Dream is over.

Any Union stands to eventually collapse. That's the Rule, any that don't, are the exception. 
 
 Just last week, an Incident in New York City caused the City to go into a Riot and eventually into an open Revolt. 
 While normally the Military of the States would be able to quell this, recent movements have prevented anything of the sort to crush the Rebellion. In the West, a United Pact of States calling themselves the "Pacific States of America" broke away from the Union. Utilizing the support of multiple Sympothisers, The Confederacy has broken off as well. Meanwhile in the North, the so-called "Free States of America" have broken away, proclaiming themselves to be the "new" Union. 
 
 The Situation now seems hopeless for America. No more Unity. No more Peace.

As I witness the utter mess of a Collapse, similar to Rome, I wonder to myself, how did this happen? Who's at fault? ... There aren't any answers unfortunately. It appears the gods aren't speaking to me. Perhaps, I should begin my support of...
We ran out of budget for a good Event Description so just go choose someone to sell Alaska to
A Russian Delegate has come up to us telling that Alaska has been put on sale, and that Moscow has offered for us to buy it and take control of the territory. What do we say to this deal?
A recent referendum in the Slavonian Kingdom has come by to either fully integrate into France or become a proper Independant Nation. The results of the referendum turned out to be...

The Caucasian Union has liberated itself from Russia. Sure. But can we truly say We're free when our Brothers and Sisters are fighting eachother? Is... Is there anything to salvage from this Union? It's on you now. Your Decision decides the Future of this Union.
We stay united against the threats of Foreign Nations!

The Popularity of the Tsar is on the Downfall as seen by the Revolts. More People demand reforms. More People demand Democracy. 
 
 However, the Government isn't budging. No reforms have been enacted. The Old Guard demands that we retain the current Government Model. 
 
 Is it... over...?
But I thought he was a charming man...

Central Asia is under limited Russian Control, and while it appears to be under Russia, there are still nations that have Control of the Area. Under suggestion of the Parliament, we've been given an opportunity to take it over for Russia.

The Tsardom has fallen, and as such, the Tsar himself has ran off to Alaska, establishing a Kingdom over there. 
 
 There wasn't anything to be done about it. The Tsar now rules Alaska. Nobody can do anything about it... 
 for now.

Slavery has been running rampant in our Glorious Nation. The Slave Owners utilize their Powers in the Nation in order to keep their Institution. \n How can we call ourselves a Free Nation, if a majority of the People aren't Free? \n Perhaps We aren't meant to be a Free Nation.

Egypt, under the rule of Muhammad Ali, has been drifting apart from us slowly. Recently, Egypt has declared itself a Nation "free from Ottoman Oppression". 
 
 This is an unjustified Declaration of Independance done by the Egyptians to very clearly spite us. 
 
 We need to respond.
We cannot let this go through!
The Peace talks have come in. \n \n Our decision is...
We shall only take Territories we claim.
Since the Balkans are now our responsibility, it is to us that we decide it's fate. Our decision is...

The Balkans have been reorganized to fit the New Times, and as such, the Sick Man of the Ottomans has lost Control over the Balkans as the responsibility has been given over to us and the new Nations. \n \n It certainly is the end of an Era.

The Balkans shall remain the same as they have for several Centuries now. The Ottoman Empire is a nation to build relations from and to ensure the Survival of our Nation. \n \n The Balkans will not be Reorganized.

Recently we've been informed that Tripolitania, a region in our Rule, has declared itself a "Free Ruling Nation", and as thus, has openly declared war on us. \n \n This has caused an uproar in the Cabinet, demanding the destruction of their so-called "Movement".

For a while, the Texans have been fighting against the Mexicans to ensure their freedom from the Mexicans and their oppresive Regime. The Revolutionaries have asked us to get in the War to help them out.
The End of the Rio Grande Movement
The former republic of the Rio Grande has lost it's support base, and has pretty much declared it's Death. No more will the Republic haunt us.
Our Vassal of Egypt has decided to break free after the Recent Decline of our Empire, and while We could attempt something, Our Empire isn't powerful enough anymore.

The Republic of Serbia has been under our Rule since years, however Recent Developments have confirmed our suspicions that a Rebel Group have waited for their moment in order to declare an Independant Serbian State.
News from London has come in, telling us to submit to their Rule fully and get integrated into their Nation.
News from London has come in, telling us to submit to their Rule and become a vassal of their Nation.
Due to recent developments, such as our recent decline, the Romanian Puppet states of Wallachia and Moldavia have freed themselves from our rule.

The Italian Republic is under division as while our Republic controls the North, the South, Sardinia and the City of Rome are all under Control of other Sovereign States, being Roma and Naples. \n \n This weakens us as the two States aren't under our full Control.

The Province of Venice and surrounding Territories have been dealt a blow by Revolters claiming our Republic as "Not Liberal" and to go down with the "Authoritarian" Regime. \n \n The Revolters are currently under Control, but it has made the Region of Northern Italy and Dalmatia more unstable as their Riots have caused disturbances for Loyalists to our Regime.

The Venetian Revolts have hit a Breaking Point, and as thus, We only have one chance to route out and ensure the Revolt doesn't explode into a Revolution. If not, then the Military must get involved...

Despite our best efforts, the Venetian People have proved themselves too strong for our Police to handle and as thus, have ensured their quick Independance. 
 
 This obviously comes as a massive blow as the Venetians are attempting to take actions against our current Government. Their Revolution is an attempt to "liberate" our Lands and ensure "Freedoms" for all. 
 
 It appears Italy has once again turned into a Battleground for multiple States.

As I look, I witness the corpses of dead Men, having attempted a Revolution to overthrow a State, a State that they disagreed with. Now I just wonder, was it worth the effort? 
 
 The attempted Revolution by Venice was crushed. However, the unfortunate side effects were felt afterwards. The attempted Revolutionaries were for the most part all killed off with the rest Jailed. This has further put together more distrust of the Regime which has responded with Radio Silence. 
 
 All we can say is "We won, but at what cost?".
We won, but at what cost?

Napoleonic Italy is no more. The Shining Light of Venice has shown that it's Light won't go out, and that the Light of Democracy outshines all. \n \n Soon enough, the Freedoms of Man shall be given to them, as will their Rights be respected, for a brighter future amongst all.

The State of Greece has recently sent a request to be integrated into our Republic as a proper State of our Democratic Nation. This obviously has had quite the reaction, with People having multiple thoughts. \n \n How do we respond?

It is becoming apparent that more and more People are sick of the Union state of Gran Colombia. Besides Colombia, the rest of the Population demands an Independant Venezuela and Ecuador, both of which are unacceptable for the Union's survival. However, the unfortunate truth turns out to be that the Revolts are beginning to spiral out of control. More and more are throwing out the possibility of a Revolution. \n \n Will it simply blow over...?

All attempts at negotiation have failed. The Straw that broke the Camel's back has occured. All provinces of Venezuela have sworn loyalty to an Independant Venezuela, and all provinces of Ecuador have sworn loyalty to Ecuador. They have gone against the Union of our nation. \n \n It's now or never.

Lima has recently been put under our Control and with it a question has been made for if we should give the South Andean population citizenship just like the North Andean population. It has been debated around in our Government if they deserve these rights or not, most discussions having ended inconclusive. \n \n However, the most recent Discussion has ended with a conclusive answer, which turned out to be...
They can't be allowed this much.

It is clear that the Colonial territories in Africa are mostly just Trade Ports. They have little to no power compared to Native Powers. So it has been decided that there needs to be change. 
 
 A recent meet up for talks about the future of the Colonization of Africa has been called and it has brought to light that African Colonies are significantly weaker than most other Colonial Territories. This must be averted. 
 
 As thus, the World Powers have made up their mind and have come together for once. Africa shall come along with the rest of the World.

A recent Conference held by several Nations has made a decision to strengthen the Empire's of Europe and America as they've made a declaration to partition this Continent for themselves. As thus, our Nation has been promptly taken over by our Overlord and folded into their Empire.

A recent Conference held by several Nations has made a decision to strengthen the Empire's of Europe and America as they've made a declaration to partition this Continent for themselves. As thus, our Nation has been promptly taken over by our Overlord and folded into their Empire.

The recently established dominion of the "Golden Coast" has presented us with an issue as it appears to be demanding us to secede lands from our nation to them. We can either ignore this or simply secede the land over to them.
To the Golden Coast it goes...

Under funding done by the Ruler himself, the Technical University of Munich has seen completion as it begins to accept Students into it's curriculum. The proud Ruler watched as his funding wasn't wasted, used to further the technological advancement of his State. Soon enough, the University will show it's worth, as the Nation goes further into the Future.

While the vision was grand, Gran Colombia was not to last, as it destroyed itself from the inside. The Country, now split up into three, has been put into crisis. Either they'd remain as "Gran Colombia", or become "Colombia". The choice was obvious. Bolivar's Dream, truly was, naive. Gran Colombia was never meant to be.
Peru has decided to defy our rightful confederation and declare their Independance for no apparent reason! This is outrageous, and we must not let them get away with it!

The Peru-Bolivian Confederation, as it was called, shall no longer exist, for it was not meant to last. Peru's soverignty has been retained whilst the Bolivians have decided to make off with their land. \n \n It's time for a great Peruvian Nation!

It has been made clear with the recent revolt in Peru that the Confederation has faults. After a quick meeting with several relevant politicians, it has been decided to squash any notion of Autonomy for Peru and fully integrate it into the Confederation. \n \n Despite the close call, the Confederation has survived.
All Lands west to the Missippi are our's!
We must dehabilitate the United States of America.

A recent demonstration by the Fascist Party has unravelled into a demand of their's demanding we allow them to control large portions of the government for their own purposes and desires. Despite the potential problems arising from refusing, accepting will ensure their Coup's success.
There's no World where we let Fascists control our Lands!

A recent demonstration by the Communist Party has unravelled into a demand of their's demanding we allow them to control large portions of the government for their own purposes and desires. Despite the potential problems arising from refusing, accepting will ensure their Coup's success.
There's no World where we let Communists control our Lands!

After the humiliating defeat in the Mexican-American War, America was destroyed from the inside. The South went under a Confederation named after the state of Virginia. The North went with a new Union known as the Free States. 
 None of the three could contest Mexico, who now dominates the North American Continent. 
 
 Manifest Destiny was just a Fantasy.
A recent request made by $FROMCOUNTRY$ has asked for the Belize territory with them pledging about 10000 of their Treasury for us to secede the small Territory to us. How shall we respond?
Belize is too vital for our State.

With the recent take over of Southern Italian territory, it has quickly gone into a discussion about the rights of Italians. \n Some argue that Italians should be treated as second class citizens, some argue the Southerners should be allowed some rights and some argue all Italians should be treated equally to Spaniards. \n The government kept arguing, until one side got a narrow victory. That side would be known for saying...
There shall be no rights for Italians!

A recent demonstration by the Anarcho-Liberal Party has unravelled into a demand of their's demanding we allow them to control large portions of the government for their own purposes and desires. Despite the potential problems arising from refusing, accepting will ensure their Coup's success.
There's no World where we let Anarcho-Liberals control our Lands!

Since the beginning of the Napoleonic Order, the Bourbons have been on the constant run from the Order. Yet, they couldn't run forever, as the last of the Bourbons have been caught in a small bar hiding out from authorities. It is now the prime time to capture and imprison the Bourbons.

With the Government distracted, the Bourbons had a clear entry point. They'd take the opportunity now and hijack it for their own gain. 
 As thus, on one day of $MONTH$, the Bourbons took their chance. They raided and couped the Government with their own supporters, though it was suspected they were secretly funded by another nation. Then, in a swift move, all supporters of the old Napoleonic Government were promptly arrested. 
 
 The Bourbons have come back.

Before the Bourbon takedown, Basque and Catalan Seperatists were already present. However, with the recent takeover, and with that a weak Government, the Seperatists gained enough power to declare their own States. As thus, the Basque Country and Catalonia have gone Independant, taken from Spanish control.
This is because of how seceding territories works
